entry.value: import pandas as pd%%00010import zipfile%%00010import lxml.etree%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010#definition of variables%%00010datafolder = flow_variables['module']+'/data'%%00010trigrams = {'agriculture':'agr',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'buildings':'bld',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'climate':'clm',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'electricity_supply':'elc',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'employment':'emp',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'industry':'ind',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'lifestyles':'lfs',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'materials':'mat',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'minerals':'min',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'social impacts':'sip',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'transboundary':'trb',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'transport':'tra',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'technology':'tec',%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009'water':'wat'%%00010}%%00010mod_tri = trigrams.get(flow_variables['module'])%%00010flow_variables['mod_tri']=mod_tri%%00010%%00010filepath = flow_variables['knime.workspace']+'/'+datafolder+'/cp_'+mod_tri+"_"+flow_variables['name']+".xlsx"%%00010%%00010xl = pd.ExcelFile(filepath)%%00010s = [n for n in xl.sheet_names if n[0:1] != '_']%%00010%%00010init = 0%%00010%%00010for i in s:%%00010%%00009df = xl.parse(i)%%00010%%00009unit = df['unit'][0]%%00010%%00009for col in df.columns:%%00010%%00009%%00009col_temp = col%%00010%%00009%%00009col_temp = i+"_"+col_temp+"["+unit+"]"%%00010%%00009%%00009flow_variables[col_temp] = df[col][0]%%00010%%00009%%00009if type(flow_variables[col_temp]) is np.int64:%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009flow_variables[col_temp] = int(flow_variables[col_temp])
